list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor `registerUser` controller and routes for improved file handling and API consistency
Enhanced file path resolution with Node's `path` module for `avatar` and `coverImage`. Fixed incorrect route prefix in `app.js`. Updated Multer middleware imports in `user.routes.js`. Improved API response structure in `registerUser` controller.

task.summary: Default task
Initial server setup with Express and dotenv integration. Added `.gitignore`, `package.json`, and IntelliJ project files.
Add deployment setup with `package.json` and dependencies. Included `package-lock.json` file and IntelliJ workspace configuration.

Add React logo to frontend assets and setup backend with initial dependencies.
Includes adding `react.svg` to the frontend and setting up the backend with `package.json`, `package-lock.json`, and necessary dependencies (`express` and `dotenv`).

Add Mongoose models for `User`, `Todo`, and `SubTodo`.
Includes setting up schemas with validation and relationships among models, such as referencing `User` in `Todo` and `SubTodo`.

Add Mongoose models for `Product`, `Category`, `Order`, and `User`.
Includes schema definitions with validation, relationships among models, and the addition of the `mongoose` dependency to `package.json`.

Add Mongoose models for `Doctor`, `Hospital`, `Patient`, and `MedicalRecord`.
Includes schema definitions with validation, relationships among models, and timestamps for auditing purposes.

Add MongoDB connection setup using Mongoose.
Includes a `connectDB` utility in `db/index.js` for connecting to the database with error handling, the database name in `constants.js`, and its invocation in `index.js`.

Refactor project structure and enhance server configuration.
Moved files from `5_Project-Beginning` to `5_Project-Folder`. Added middleware (CORS, JSON parsing, CookieParser) in `app.js`, and updated `index.js` to manage server startup with proper error handling.

Add utility classes for streamlined error and response handling.
Introduced `ApiResponse` and `ApiError` classes for standardized API responses and error management. Refactored `asyncHandler` for improved error propagation in asynchronous route handlers.

Add utility methods to `User` model for authentication
Includes `isPasswordCorrect`, `generateAccessToken`, and `generateRefreshToken` methods for password verification and token generation using `bcrypt` and `jsonwebtoken`.

Add Cloudinary integration and middleware for handling file uploads
Includes a utility for uploading files to Cloudinary and a Multer middleware for temporary storage of uploaded files.
Project setup has been completed now.

Add user registration route and controller
Implemented `POST /api/v1/users/register` with a basic `registerUser` controller. Added route handling, imported it into `app.js`, and included proper async handling utility.

Add file upload handling for user registration
Integrated Multer middleware to handle avatar and cover image uploads. Updated `POST /api/v1/users/register` to process and upload images to Cloudinary during user registration.

Refactor `registerUser` controller for improved file handling and clean-up
Commented out and replaced unnecessary logs. Added logic to conditionally handle `coverImage` paths. Ensured local files are removed after Cloudinary upload.

Add `loginUser` and `logoutUser` controllers with JWT-based authentication
Implemented `POST /api/v1/users/login` and `POST /api/v1/users/logout` for user authentication and session management. Added `verifyJWT` middleware for secure route protection and integrated token handling in cookies.

Add `refreshAccessToken` controller and route for token renewal
Implemented `POST /api/v1/users/refresh-token` to handle access token renewal using refresh tokens. Updated user controller and routes to include the new functionality. Integrated JWT verification and secure cookie handling.

Add additional user management functionality and subscription model
Implemented new controllers for updating user account details, changing passwords, managing avatars, and cover images. Added `getCurrentUser` endpoint. Introduced a `Subscription` Mongoose model to handle user subscriptions.

Add avatar deletion logic and enhance Cloudinary utility
Implemented `deleteFromCloudinary` utility for file deletion. Updated avatar update logic to remove old avatars from Cloudinary. Enhanced `user.controller.js` for improved API response consistency.

Add `getUserChannelProfile` controller for fetching user channel data
Implemented a new controller to retrieve user channel profile with subscriber count, subscription details, and related metadata. Updated exports in `user.controller.js` to include the new functionality.

Add `getWatchHistory` controller and route for fetching user watch history
Implemented a new controller to retrieve user watch history with related video and owner details using aggregation pipelines. Added the corresponding route in `user.routes.js` and updated exports in `user.controller.js`.

Refactor `registerUser` controller and routes for improved file handling and API consistency
Enhanced file path resolution with Node's `path` module for `avatar` and `coverImage`. Fixed incorrect route prefix in `app.js`. Updated Multer middleware imports in `user.routes.js`. Improved API response structure in `registerUser` controller.

MESSAGE.value: Initial server setup with Express and dotenv integration. Added `.gitignore`, `package.json`, and IntelliJ project files.
Add `/github` route to serve static GitHub user data as JSON
Add deployment setup with `package.json` and dependencies. Included `package-lock.json` file and IntelliJ workspace configuration.

Add React logo to frontend assets and setup backend with initial dependencies.
Includes adding `react.svg` to the frontend and setting up the backend with `package.json`, `package-lock.json`, and necessary dependencies (`express` and `dotenv`).

Add Mongoose models for `User`, `Todo`, and `SubTodo`.
Includes setting up schemas with validation and relationships among models, such as referencing `User` in `Todo` and `SubTodo`.

Includes schema definitions with validation, relationships among models, and timestamps for auditing purposes.

Add MongoDB connection setup using Mongoose.
Includes a `connectDB` utility in `db/index.js` for connecting to the database with error handling, the database name in `constants.js`, and its invocation in `index.js`.

Moved files from `5_Project-Beginning` to `5_Project-Folder`. Added middleware (CORS, JSON parsing, CookieParser) in `app.js`, and updated `index.js` to manage server startup with proper error handling.

Includes `isPasswordCorrect`, `generateAccessToken`, and `generateRefreshToken` methods for password verification and token generation using `bcrypt` and `jsonwebtoken`.

Add Cloudinary integration and middleware for handling file uploads
Includes a utility for uploading files to Cloudinary and a Multer middleware for temporary storage of uploaded files.

Implemented a new controller to retrieve user channel profile with subscriber count, subscription details, and related metadata. Updated exports in `user.controller.js` to include the new functionality.

Add `getWatchHistory` controller and route for fetching user watch history
Implemented a new controller to retrieve user watch history with related video and owner details using aggregation pipelines. Added the corresponding route in `user.routes.js` and updated exports in `user.controller.js`.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:

Enhanced file path resolution with Node's `path` module for `avatar` and `coverImage`. Fixed incorrect route prefix in `app.js`. Updated Multer middleware imports in `user.routes.js`. Improved API response structure in `registerUser` controller.
